Text:
Sweet
Once upon a time, there was a dude with a phone on his knee. One day, the phone rang and the knee of the dude began to vibrate.
"Hello" answered the dude.
The dude heard a raspy "Hello", in response, on his phone on his knee.
It was a voice he hadn't heard in ages, but one that he recognized as a Mother would a picture of her own child.
In the split-second it took the dude to convert his reaction from thought, into communication, he was interrupted by the raspy voice on his phone on his knee.

^I'm not sure why I started writing that. ^ Or where it's going.
Sometimes ideas just pop into my head. This one popped while I was here D/L'ing this torrent. I'll have to copy/paste & finish it later. In the meantime- Enjoy

Or better yet.... Continue the story in ur own comment, it'll be a community story!!!

"I am your knee" rasped the knee.
"But if you're my knee, who was phone?" said John
and then john was a zombie
My favourite part had to have been 'who was phone'. *applauds*

I used to be a dude.
Until I took a phone to the knee.
You guys just blew my mind.
